Verses: 1 aaronin Irandu Kumaarar Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyile Serndhu Mariththupponapinbu, Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 kirubaasanaththinmel Oru Megaththil Naan Kaanappaduven; Aadhalaal Un Sagodharanaagiya Aaron Saagaadhapadi, Parisuththa Sthalaththile Thiraikku Utpuraththilirukkira Pettiyinmelulla Kirubaasana Moodikku Munbaaga Sagala Velaiyilum Varavendaam Endru Avanukku Sol.
3 aaron Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Pravesikkavendiya Vidhamaavadhu: Avan Oru Kaalaiyaip Paavanivaaranapaliyaagavum, Oru Aattukkadaavai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagavum Seluththip Pravesikkavendum.

4 avan Parisuththamaana Sanalnool Sattaiyaith Thariththu, Than Araikku Sanalnool Jalladaththaippottu, Sanalnool Idaikkachchaiyaik Katti, Sanalnool Paagaiyaith Thariththukkondirukkavendum; Avaigal Parisuththa Vasthirangal; Avan Jalaththile Snaanampanni, Avaigalaith Thariththukkondu,
5 isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaaridaththile, Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Irandu Vellaattukkadaakkalaiyum, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum Vaangakkadavan.
6 pinbu Aaron Thanakkaagavum Than Veettaarukkaagavum Paavanivirththi Seyyumpadikku, Thannudaiya Paavanivaaranapaliyin Kaalaiyai Serappanni,
7 andha Irandu Vellaattukkadaakkalaiyum Konduvandhu, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Niruththi,
8 andha Irandu Vellaattukkadaakkalaiyunkuriththuk Karththarukkendru Oru Seettum, Pokkaadaaga Vidappadum Vellaattukkadaavukkendru Oru Seettum Pottu,
9  Karththarukkendru Seettu Vizhundha Vellaattukkadaavaip Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Serappanni,
10 pokkaadaaga Vidappada Seettu Vizhundha Vellaattukkadaavai, Adhaikkondu Paavanivirththi Undaakkavum Adhaip Pokkaadaaga Vanaandharaththile Pogavidavum, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Uyirode Niruththi;
11 pinbu Aaron Thanakkaagavum Than Veettaarukkaagavum Paavanivirththi Seyyumpadi, Thannudaiya Paavanivaaranaththukkaana Kaalaiyaik Konduvandhu, Adhaik Kondru,

12  Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyilirukkum Palipeedaththinmelulla Neruppuththanalinaal Thoobakalasaththai Nirappi, Podiyaakkappatta Sugandha Thoobavarkkaththile Than Kaippidigal Niraiya Eduththu, Thiraikku Utpuramaagak Konduvandhu,
13 thaan Saagaadhapadikkuth Thoobamegamaanadhu Saatchippettiyinmel Irukkum Kirubaasanaththai Moodaththakkadhaaga, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Akkiniyinmel Thoobavarkkaththaip Podakkadavan

14 pinbu Kaalaiyin Raththaththile Konjam Eduththu, Keezhppuramaaga Nindru, Thanviralinaal Kirubaasanaththinmel Theliththu, Andha Raththaththil Konjam Eduththuk Kirubaasanaththukku Munbaaga, Ezhudharam Than Viralinaal Thelikkakkadavan.

15 pinbu Janaththinudaiya Paavanivaaranapaliyaana Vellaattukkadaavai Avan Kondru, Adhin Raththaththaith Thiraikku Utpuramaagak Konduvandhu, Kaalaiyin Raththaththaith Theliththadhupola, Adhin Raththaththaiyum Kirubaasanaththinmelum Adharku Munbaagavum Theliththu,

16 isravel Puththirarudaiya Theettugalinimiththamum, Avargaludaiya Sagala Paavangalinaalum Undaana Avargaludaiya Meerudhalgalinimiththamum, Parisuththa Sthalaththirkaagap Praayachchiththancheydhu, Avargalidaththil Avargaludaiya Theettugalukkulle Nirkira Aasarippuk Koodaaraththirkaagavum Appadiye Seyyakkadavan.

17 paavanivirththi Seyyumpadi Avan Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Pravesiththu, Thanakkaagavum Than Veettaarukkaagavum Isravel Sabaiyaar Anaivarukkaagavum Paavanivirththi Seydhu, Veliye Varumalavum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Oruvarum Irukkalaagaadhu.

18 pinbu Avan Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Irukkira Palipeedaththandai Vandhu, Adharkaagap Praayachchiththancheydhu, Kaalaiyin Raththaththilum Vellaattukkadaavin Raththaththilum Konjam Eduththu, Palipeedaththuk Kombugalinmel Sutrilum Poosi,
19 than Viralinaal Andha Raththaththil Eduththu, Ezhudharam Adhinmel Theliththu, Adhai Isravel Puththirarin Theettugal Neenga Suththigariththu, Parisuththappaduththakkadavan
20 avan Ippadip Parisuththa Sthalaththukkum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkum Palipeedaththukkum Praayachchiththancheydhu Theerththapinbu, Uyirodirukkira Vellaattukkadaavai Serappanni,

21 adhin Thalaiyinmel Aaron Than Irandu Kaigalaiyum Vaiththu, Adhinmel Isravel Puththirarudaiya Sagala Akkiramangalaiyum Avargaludaiya Ellaap Paavangalinaalum Undaana Avargaludaiya Sagala Meerudhalgalaiyum Arikkaiyittu, Avaigalai Vellaattukkadaavinudaiya Thalaiyinmel Sumaththi, Adhai Adharkaana Aalvasamaai Vanaandharaththukku Anuppividakkadavan.
22 andha Vellaattukkadaa Avargaludaiya Akkiramangalaiyellaam Thanmel Sumandhukondu, Kudiyillaadha Dhesaththukkup Povadhaaga; Avan Andha Vellaattukkadaavai Vanaandharaththile Pogavidakkadavan.
23 aaron Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkul Vandhu, Thaan Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Pravesikkumpodhu, Uduththiyirundha Sanalnool Vasthirangalaik Kalaindhu, Ange Vaiththuvittu,

24 parisuththa Idaththile Jalaththil Snaanampanni, Than Vasthirangalai Uduththikkondu, Veliye Vandhu, Than Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Janangalin Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Ittu, Thanakkaagavum Janangalukkaagavum Paavanivirththi Seydhu,
25 paavanivaaranapaliyin Kozhuppaip Palipeedaththinmel Thaganikkakkadavan.
26 pogavidappadum Pokkaadaagiya Vellaattukkadaavaik Kondupoi Vittavan, Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Jalaththil Snaanampanni, Pinbu Paalayaththukkul Varuvaanaaga.

27 paavanivirththikkendru Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Raththam Konduvarappatta Paavanivaaranapaliyaagiya Kaalaiyaiyum, Paavanivaaranapaliyaagiya Vellaattukkadaavaiyum, Paalayaththukkup Purambe Kondupoi, Avaigalin Tholaiyum Maamsaththaiyum Saaniyaiyum Akkiniyile Sutterikkakkadavargal.
28 avaigalai Sutteriththavan Than Vasthirangalaith Thoiththu, Jalaththile Snaanampanni, Pinbu Paalayaththukkul Varuvaanaaga.

29 ezhaam Maadham Paththaam Thedhiyile, Sudhesiyaanaalum Ungalukkul Thangum Paradhesiyaanaalum, Thangal Aaththumaakkalaith Thaazhmaippaduththuvadhumandri, Oru Velaiyum Seyyaamal Irukkavendum; Idhu Ungalukku Niththiya Kattalaiyaai Irukkakkadavadhu.
30 karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Ungal Paavamellaam Neengi Suththigarikkumpadi, Annaalil Ungalai Suththigarikkum Poruttu, Ungalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyappadum.
31 ungalukku Adhu Viseshiththa Oivunaal; Adhile Ungal Aaththumaakkalaith Thaazhmaip Paduththakkadaveergal; Idhu Niththiya Kattalai.

32 abishegam Petravanum, Than Thagappan Pattaththirku Vandhu Aasaariya Oozhiyancheyyap Pradhishtaipannappattavanumaagiya Aasaariyane Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan. Avan Parisuththa Vasthirangalaagiya Sanalnool Vasthirangalai Uduththikkondu,
33 parisuththa Sthalaththukkum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkum Palipeedaththukkum Praayachchiththancheydhu, Aasaariyarukkaagavum Sabaiyin Sagala Janangalukkaagavum Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan.

34 ippadi Varushaththil Orumurai Isravel Puththirarukkaaga, Avargaludaiya Sagala Paavangalukkum Paavanivirththi Seyvadhu, Ungalukku Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkakkadavadhu Endru Sol Endraar. Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Aaron Seydhaan.
